messages.subject: ~Snail Mail PenPals~
messages.msgSnippet: ~Hello~Boy! We would like to thank everyone who responded to our idea for Snail Mail PenPals! The response has been overwhelming! We thought we might flush out
messages.messageBody:
~Hello~Boy! We would like to thank everyone who responded to our idea for Snail Mail PenPals! The response has been overwhelming! We thought we might flush out 1 or 2 but our count is up to 45! It's incredible, Thank You!! If you have wrote to us and have not heard back from us....don't worry...it's coming!!We are answering everyone who took the time to write to us, everyone will receive a letter. When all of the responses started coming in, our eyes were wide with delight! We have started marking a map to track where all of our new friends are. This has turned into so much fun for all of us. Again, Thank you to everyone!Anyone still interested...we would love to meet you!...please email us privately to exchange address.~Wishing Everyone a Beautiful Day~~Annie~~~You may laugh at me because I am different. I laugh at you because you are all the same.~~

_______________________________________________
Can a Web portal forever change your life?

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
